mapper.insert:
insert into driver_order_daily (id, report_time, driver_name, driver_id, truck_number, truck_id, mileage, receive_waybill_quantity, refuse_waybill_quantity, anomaly_waybill_quantity, complete_waybill_quantity, avg_receive_duration, load_punctuality_rate, unload_punctuality_rate, freight, anomaly_cost, total_cost, enabled, create_time, modify_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.truckNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.truckId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.mileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.receiveWaybillQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.refuseWaybillQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.anomalyWaybillQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.completeWaybillQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.avgReceiveDuration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.loadPunctualityRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.unloadPunctualityRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.freight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.anomalyCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.totalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(report_time, 1, 7) as report_time, driver_id, driver_name, truck_id, truck_number, SUM(CASE WHEN mileage IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE mileage END) AS mileage, SUM(receive_waybill_quantity) AS receive_waybill_quantity, SUM(refuse_waybill_quantity) AS refuse_waybill_quantity, SUM(anomaly_waybill_quantity) AS anomaly_waybill_quantity, SUM(complete_waybill_quantity) AS complete_waybill_quantity, AVG(avg_receive_duration) AS avg_receive_duration, AVG(load_punctuality_rate) AS load_punctuality_rate, AVG(CASE WHEN unload_punctuality_rate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE unload_punctuality_rate END) AS unload_punctuality_rate, SUM(CASE WHEN freight IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE freight END) AS freight, SUM(anomaly_cost) AS anomaly_cost, SUM(CASE WHEN total_cost IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE total_cost END) AS total_cost FROM driver_order_daily WHERE enabled = 1 AND report_time BETWEEN #{beginMonth} AND #{endMonth} GROUP BY driver_id, driver_name, truck_id, truck_number, SUBSTR(report_time, 1, 7)
